location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 22 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus informs Newnham that he had requested the officer commanding the Antelopeto provide a passage to Bombay for four Americans whose names were contained in an enclosed letter (not transcribed).
